name: Tidal Swiftness
text: A surge of churning, rushing water from the Plane of Water drives you swiftly across the ground, even in the most arid or frigid of regions. This magically conjured water does not last long once it surges to enhance your speed, but its appearance can certainly astound those unaccustomed to such sights.
benefit:
As a standard action, you can call forth a tide of water that flows around your feet and enhances your speed, as per slipstream.

You can use this feat’s benefit for a number of minutes per day equal to your ranks in Knowledge (planes). These minutes need not be consecutive, but they must be spent in 1-minute increments.
text_zh: 即使你正身处最干旱或最寒冷的地方，从水元素位面汹涌而来的潮水亦能驱使你快速穿梭。虽然这种加速一次不会太久，但这神奇灵动的水流依然让人为之一振。
benefit_zh: 以一个标准动作，你能召唤一股水流至你足下从而提高你的速度，如同你获得了水流术(APG)的增益一样，你每天可以从本专长受益的分钟数等于你的知识（位面）等级，这些时间不必连续使用，但每次启动至少以1分钟为单位使用本专长。
